subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Houston finished with a winning record for the first time and kept its playoff hopes alive, but Patriots receiver Wes Welker’s left leg buckled as he turned to go upfield after a 12-yard reception.
snippet: Houston finished with a winning record for the first time and kept its playoff hopes alive, but Patriots receiver Wes Welker’s left leg buckled as he turned to go upfield after a 12-yard reception.
